entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
